text: "Can U Get wit It" is a song by American singer Usher. It was the lead single from his debut album Usher (1994). It reached at number 59 on the Billboard Hot 100. It also reached number 91 on the UK Singles Chart. The song was produced by Jodeci's DeVante Swing. ==Track listings== US Vinyl, 12" # Can U Get Wit It [Extended Edit] 6:58 # Can U Get Wit It [Album Version] 4:56 # Can U Get Wit It [Instrumental - Album Version] 4:58 # Can U Get Wit It [TV track] 5:00 UK Vinyl, 12", Promo # "Can U Get Wit It" [Radio Edit] 4:15 # "Can U Get Wit It" [Alternate Radio Edit] 4:14 # "Can U Get Wit It" [Gangsta Lean Edit] 5:49 # "Can U Get Wit It" [Extended Edit] 6:58 ==Charts== Chart (1994) Peak position UK Singles Chart 91 U.S. Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs 13 U.S. Billboard Hot 100 59 Category:1994 songs Category:Usher songs
title: Can U Get wit It
